summary: Request for sleepUntil and UpdatableTimer utility functions to simplify common async patterns in workflows, particularly for recurring tasks like monthly operations.
userImpact: Users currently must implement sleepUntil and updatable timers themselves, making workflows with monthly operations or dynamic timer modifications cumbersome.
proposedFix: Implement sleepUntil and UpdatableTimer as utility functions that compose together, with sleepUntil handling absolute timestamp sleeping and UpdatableTimer allowing mid-flight timer modifications.
resolutionDetails: Left as samples/documentation examples rather than building into the SDK, with possibility of making it an auxiliary library eventually.
keyQuote: sleepuntil is needed because most users will probably have to write it themselves. especially when they try to do anything on a monthly basis
